description:
Building a WordPress site never been that easy

You can take your business to the next level by providing your customers with a compiling & attractive WordPress site .

Amazing website will help your customers make their decisions about buying a product or service.

I'll Teach you how to create a stunning WordPress website today!

Here’s a brief insight into the great assistance that I have in store for you :

  • You will get to know how to build solid WordPress websites and how to make their best use for your business.
  • You will learn how to buy a domain name without much hassles
  • You will get to know details about how to buy web hosting & How yo set it up
  • You will be able to know how to install WordPress. 
  • You will get to know about affiliate site setup & how to get useful content
  • This is the first video in AdSense site setup
title: WordPress Site-Building Simplified
instructors: Fadwa A Soliman, Female Entrepreneur Empires, Queen mama academy
